item.description:
2007 Northwest Park Country Fair ?Fun & Games? VOLUNTEERS

VOLUNTEER SIGN-IN/Out & assign ?Floaters?, safeguard supplies, distribute stickers, etc. (runs 8:30-4:30):
HEIDI Lindberg - CHAIR 8-4:30

BEAD JEWELRY (runs 10-3):
ROBERTA Connolly - CHAIR 9:00-5:30*
DEBBIE H. (10-1) 11:30-1:00 (a2)
KATHY Smith (1:00-5:30) 1:00-3:30* (b1)

HAYSTACK TREASURE HUNT (runs 10-4):
BOB Simon 9:30-5:30*
JILL 9:30-5:30*

?FUN?: BEAN BAGS, STILTS, etc. AREA (runs 10-4):
Betsy DeCorimer 9:30-1:30
SANTI R. (& 9 y.o. child)10-1:00
HOWIE J. 11-5:30*
CINDY 1:00-5:00
KATHY Smith (1:00-5:30) 3:30-5:30* (b2)

BUBBLES (runs 10-4):
DEBBIE H. (10-1) 10-11:30 (a1)
MARYANN 11:00-2:00
KATY G. 2:00-4:00

GREASED POLE (runs 10-4):
AL Reigins 9:30-5:30*
JOHN 3:00-5:30*

FISHING HOLE (runs 10-4):
STEVE Theriault 9:30-5:30*

ROB Pudney*, w/ the assistance of DEB Cunningham*, (both 8:00-5:30) will set-up, run, & hand out prizes and ribbons:
PIE-EATING Contest 11:15
SACK RACE 12:15
3-LEGGED RACE 1:15
Tug-O-War over MUD PIT 3:15

MARCIA Pedersen, PHIL Dvorak, and JESSIE Dvorak will run:
WATER-BALLOON TOSS 2:15

?FLOATERS? will cover unmanned stations as assigned by Heidi L. / F&G Vol Table:

CARRIE K. 12:00-5:30*
TINA TBD
KATHY G. 1:00-5:30*

* = Volunteered to stay to help pack up and clean up!!!


PUMPKIN CARVING & DECORATING TEAM (runs 10-2):
NOTE: ?Team BIZEAU Family? has run this for 13 years!!!
JUSTINE Bizeau ? CHAIR 9-3
ELIZABETH Colon 9-3
ERIC Milner 9-3
JESSICA Colon 9-3
NATE Rubert 9-3
JACQUELINE Colon 9-3
TAMI Perrin 9-3

FYI: As I don't have most of your direct email edresses (nor last names), I can not email directly to you my "formatted" WORD version of these last-minute UPDATED notices, hence trying to get this info to you in this manner. I will "assume" you are fine with the above scheduling unless you notify me otherwise ASAP with corrections, last names, etc. If so, please email me directly, including your email and Cell# so we can communicate better. Thx! - Rob Pudney C: (860) 690-9595 rep60450@cox.net
